added.title: Added new keyboard shortcuts
added.subtitle: Toggle Always-on-Top, Move Window to Center, Restore Window Size, Toggle Vertical/Horizontal Maximization.

added.title: Move tile groups to a new workspace/monitor with the Tile Editing Mode
added.subtitle: Shift+Directions moves the tile group to a new monitor; Shift+Alt+Directions to a new workspace.

added.title: Tiled windows will untile automatically if they change workspaces

changed.title: Adapt edge-tiling only if it doesn't cover existing tiles and their tile groups
changed.subtitle: Use Ctrl-drag (mouse) or the Tile Editing Mode (keyboard) to 'replace/cover' existing tiles. That way 1 window can be part of multiple tile groups.

changed.title: Changed the default shortcuts from Super+Numpad to follow GNOME's native behaviour (Super+Up/Down/Left/Right)
Renamed 'Split Tiles' mode to 'Adaptive Tiling'
changed.subtitle: This is the mode when moving a window around while holding Ctrl.

changed.title: Disabled grouping tiled windows in the app switcher by default and mark that setting as experimental
Deprecated the 'Toggle Tiling Popup' and 'Auto-Tile' keyboard shortcuts
changed.subtitle: Deprecated settings won't be visible in the prefs window anymore unless they have a non-default value set.

fixed.title: Fixed a compatibility issue introduced in v31 with other alt-Tab extensions
Shortcuts may no longer change unintentionally after using the clear-shortcut-button
